name: 喻沐英
objective: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的拕發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
Week 1. Orientation 
Week 2  Unit 1: Reading Hypotheses
Week 3  Unit 1: Lecture. The Experimental Method
Week 4  Unit 1: Listening. Common Myths about Colds.
Week 5  Unit 2: Lecture. New Ways in Advertising
Week 6  Unit 2: Reading Advertising 
Week 7  Unit 2: Listening. Advice from the Professor. 
Week 8  Unit 2: Integrated Speaking Task. 
Week 9  期中考
Week 10 Unit 3: Reading.What Killed the Dinosaurs? 
Week 11 Unit 3: Reading. Reports of a Major Collision
Week 12 Unit 3: Lecture Are asteroids and Comets Dangerous?
Week 13 Unit 3: Integrated Writing Task. 
Week 14 Unit 4: Lecture. Using Your Imagination on Stage
Week 15 Unit 4: Reading. Imagination: An Actor’s Tool
Week 16 Unit 4: Reading. Gladiator and Elizabeth
Week 17 Unit 4: Integrated Speaking Task
Week 18 期末考
scorePolicy: Assessment for the course will comprise up to three demonstrations, as well as assignment and tests, which will be given at the instructor’s discretion. The grade will be a cumulative average of all demonstrations, in class assignments, homework, tests, and attendance.
